original_text: Already I could have used my power to destroy you and your people. With one very bad trouble, I could have removed you from the earth.
korean_text: 내가 손을 펴서 돌림병으로 너와 네 백성을 쳤더라면 네가 세상에서 끊어졌을 것이나

sentences.original_text: Already I could have used my power
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 이미 내 힘을 사용할 수 있었는데

sentences.original_text: to destroy you and your people
I could have removed you from the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 땅에서 제거할 수 있었는데
